name: Alert
description: Contextual feedback messages for informing users about important information, warnings, errors, or success states

accessibility.screenReader: Error and warning variants use role=alert with aria-live=assertive for immediate announcement. Info and success variants use role=status with aria-live=polite. Closable alerts have an accessible dismiss button.

recommendedUsage: Use to communicate important contextual information to users. Choose variant based on message severity: info for neutral messages, success for confirmations, warning for potential issues, error for failures.
antiPatterns: Do not use for transient notifications - use Toast instead. Avoid using alerts for routine status updates that would cause announcement fatigue.
